moves.name: Avatar State
moves.description: Aang enters the Avatar State, becoming extremely powerful

moves.name: Tornado Whirl
moves.description: Aang spins a dazzling whirlwind at his opponent

moves.name: Dolphin Spray
moves.description: Aang showers his opponent with a strong burst of water

characters.name: Toph
characters.description: small, blind, sees with her feet

moves.name: Avalanche
moves.description: Toph creates an avalanche, crushing her opponent with large rocks

moves.name: Little Rich Girl
moves.description: Toph uses her wealthy background to hire a random guy to punch her opponent in the face

moves.name: Foot Quake
moves.description: Toph uses her feet to sense the earth and create a trembling earthquake

moves.name: Geyser
moves.description: Toph creates a hole in the ground and a geyser erupts in her opponent's face

new moves.name: Foot Quake
new moves.description: Aang uses his feet to sense the earth and create a trembling earthquake
